effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
